name: aws-appsync-boilerplate
description: Develop AWS AppSync GraphQL API using Cloud Formation

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --s3-bucket contacts-dev-codes --template-file template.yml --output-template-file packaged-template.yml --profile faisal
scripts.upload: aws cloudformation deploy --stack-name contacts-dev --template-file packaged-template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides ApiName=contacts-dev --profile faisal
scripts.deploy: npm run package && npm run upload

author: Faisal Hasnain <faisal.hasnain@icloud.com>
